page.title: 02OUR VISIT TO HEATH COURT.
page.content: Heath Court,an old peoples residence was built in December 1980.It was opened by Ted Moult in March 1981.most people who live there have lived there about 4 years.In the daytime the women do shopping, sewing, cleaning, watching television and knitting.The men do hairdressing, shopping, housework, watching and playing sport.There are a few special times, like bingo evenings, coffee mornings and a church service.They have got a chief warden, assistant warden, relief warden, 2 cleaners and a gardener.The warden helps people if they need help.Their flats are well equipped. They have got a hairdressing salon and a library.Most people can go shopping on their own and they can take as much money as they want.Everybody enjoys life at Heath Court. By Julie,Lisa and Sarah.
